thread.title: Alok Nath joins Yeh Rishta team, to work with real life sister
thread.title_full: Alok Nath joins Yeh Rishta team, to work with real life sister

author: Deccan
title: Alok Nath joins Yeh Rishta team, to work with real life sister
text: Deccan Chronicle | Natasha Coutinho | October 20, 2015, 16.35 pm Mumbai: Vineeta Malik, who plays the role of Akshara’s daadi on the Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai, is Alok Nath’s older sister in real life. The actress is happy to now have her brother on the same show. The actress said, “Not many know that Alok is my younger brother. I am obviously elated to have him on Yeh Rishta. We will be meeting more often since we will be on the same set.” Alok added, “It is a strange yet extremely pleasant coincidence. Vineeta has been on the show since the beginning and I have just entered. This is the first time that we’re working on the same show.” Bollywood entertainment Alok Nath Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai Also Read What Chris Martin is really doing in India It’s official, Amala is in love with Vijay! Abhishek, Aishwarya and Aaradhya attend birthday party in Mumbai Taylor Swift's house pelted with beer bottles
